detailsData.title: Values-Based Investing
detailsData.content: Aligning investments with personal values for impact.

subHeading: Driving Capital to Social and Environmental Good
valueProp: Portola Creek Capital aligns your investment portfolio with your personal values, driving capital to social and environmental good.

testimonalData.text: I have been impressed with the personalized service and impact-driven investment strategies at Portola Creek.
testimonalData.author: John Smith

testimonalData.text: Portola Creek helped me align my investments with my values, creating a positive impact on society.
testimonalData.author: Jane Doe

testimonalData.text: The team at Portola Creek is dedicated to driving positive change through conscientious investing.
testimonalData.author: Alice Johnson
